title: Share read for text resource files
body: Fixes #7229 by ensuring that MSBuild's processing of a `.txt` resource holds only the minimal lock: open for read and allowing other processes to read while it's open.

commit.message:
Share read for text resource files

Fixes #7229 by ensuring that MSBuild's processing of a `.txt` resource holds only the minimal lock: open for read and allowing other processes to read while it's open.
